duties_responsibilities.duty: Design & build solutions, frameworks, automation, & orchestration for a broad range of applications.
Writing unit/integration tests and refactoring when appropriate.
Break apart complex initiatives into manageable chunks.
Provide experience & support for the planning, execution of complex technical projects.
Collaborate with a distributed team and stakeholders.
Advocate architecture, design, and software engineering principles.
Lead and mentor the team to follow software engineering standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
